mapper.sql:
and c.process_status in ('PRCS2001' ,'PRCS2002') and c.doc_status in('PRCS1001','PRCS1002')
AND c.created_at BETWEEN DATE(#{startDt}) AND DATE_ADD(DATE(#{endDt}), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND c.updated_at BETWEEN DATE(#{startDt}) AND DATE_ADD(DATE(#{endDt}), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND c.created_at BETWEEN DATE(#{startDt}) AND DATE_ADD(DATE(#{endDt}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND c.updated_at BETWEEN DATE(#{startDt}) AND DATE_ADD(DATE(#{endDt}), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
and ct.template_title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and c.emp_no like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and c.name like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and c.emp_no like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') or ct.template_title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') or c.name like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and LOWER(c.doc_status) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%',#{contractDocStatusType} , '%'))
and LOWER(c.process_status) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%',#{contractStatusType} , '%'))
mapper.select: select count(c.contract_no) from contracts c join contract_template ct on c.template_seq = ct.template_seq join contract_template_details ctd on ct.template_seq = ctd.template_seq where c.del_yn = 'N'

select c.contract_no /*getContractProgressInfo - 진행 중인 계약서 view*/ , c.emp_no , c.template_seq , c.doc_status , c.process_status , c.signature_data_no , c.validation , c.agree_yn , c.del_yn , c.created_by , c.created_at , c.updated_by , c.updated_at , ct.template_title , u.name , c.sign_date , ctd.contract_title_en , u.dept_code , date_format(c.assigned_at ,'%Y-%m-%d') as assigned_at , c.assigned_by from contracts c join contract_template ct on c.template_seq = ct.template_seq join users u on c.emp_no = u.emp_no join contract_template_details ctd on ct.template_seq = ctd.template_seq where c.contract_no = #{seq}
